title: Ep. 157 - 3rd Podiversary!
itunes:title: Ep. 157 - 3rd Podiversary!
description:
Hey Listener, it's our 3rd Podiversary!!! You know what that means: it's time for Erin's State of the Podcast Address, emails from YOU, many rounds of Fuck Marry Kill, and more! Thank you so much for making this podcast what it is. The secret ingredient is love because of you. 
 Bonus Content: #intellectualismin2020 was a huge success, Ask-A-Badass rules, Ushma is an awesome new mod, Melody is a very enthusiastic side-kick, new podcast name: Shaking Boobies with Erin and Melody, Mic Bunnies, and SO MUCH MORE. 
 Episode Sponsor: 
 FOLLOW ME DARKLY by Helen Hardt! Publisher's Weekly said "Hardt spins erotic gold out of the undefined relationship between a dominant, emotionally distant Boston billionaire and a girl-next-door Midwesterner in the first romance of her Follow Me series," and that "readers who like their romance with a dominant and sexy edge will devour this addictive series launch." Book 1 ends with a cliffhanger! 
 Watch this HILARIOUS music video that is a loving tribute to our intolerances. 
 Check out all our merch designers and their awesome hustle! 
 - https://www.instagram.com/raystrikesback/ (Rachel Ross) and her  apparel shop
 - https://katemahondesign.squarespace.com/ (Kate Mahon Design)
 - https://www.instagram.com/junosunbear/ (Juno Sunbear) also writes erotica! 
 - Right Eye Digital
 Outro Music by Sabrina B! Check out her song about romance tropes, too! 
 An HB wrote an article that was partially inspired by Heaving Bosoms!
  
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
